scripts.prepack: cross-env BABEL_ENV=build babel --root-mode upward --extensions .ts,.tsx src --out-dir lib --source-maps --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=build babel --root-mode upward --extensions .ts,.tsx src --out-dir lib --source-maps --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments --watch
